Text: Thank you for hanging in there for so long to complete this rare film. It is customary to state that an upload is a VHSrip, although in this case it obviously has to be. The rip only has sound in the right channel, but that doesn't bother me.
Yea, the DVD recorder I had then was a stand alone, and the VCR only had one audio out jack. My new recorder is combined, so the rips I'm doing now should have both channels.

c'mon c'mon c'mon. You gotta be kiddin' me 0.6kB/s. Is this what you call speed??? Really???!!
Seed guys please!!!
